attributes.action: Stop DVLA using new Vehicle Tax rules to gain revenue
attributes.background: GHOST TAX Car tax loophole means you’re paying TWICE when you sell on your motor – and helping the DVLA net £40million a year. DVLA not sticking to Original policy to refund previous owners for full months paid after Sale

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
